Celebrity-approved modern jewelry brand Jenny Bird (the little birdy in question) is holding its always anticipated 48-hour sale. That’s right, starting 7 p.m. EST on April 3, the *entire* Jenny Bird site (with a few exceptions) will be on sale. Many of Jenny Bird’s statement silver and gold earrings, bracelets, necklaces, and more will be discounted at 25% off during the two-day sale. A little jewel-adorned birdy told us something big is coming, so we're breaking the good news! Celebrity-approved modern jewelry brand Jenny Bird (the little birdy in question) is holding its always anticipated 48-hour sale. That’s right, starting 7 p.m. EST on April 3, the *entire* Jenny Bird site (with a few exceptions) will be on sale.

Many of Jenny Bird’s statement silver and gold earrings, bracelets, necklaces, and more will be discounted at 25% off during the two-day sale. (Just note that all purchases are final sale!)  

Whether you’re looking for gold-plated chunky earrings or chain-link anklets (Refinery29 editor favorites) or zodiac sign necklaces, you’ll likely be able to find them on sale for 48 sweet hours. Keep an eye out for exclusive pieces and special deals, too: For example, you could get a free ear cuff set when you spend more than $225. So get browsing and consider carting up luxe pieces for yourself — or maybe for upcoming gifting needs for loved ones (*cough cough* Mother’s Day) — while they’re heavily discounted.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Jenny Bird Earrings On Sale

While the majority of the deals during Jenny Bird’s 48-hour sale are 25% off, a few select pieces are 30% off — including some of the brand’s most covetable earring styles. Regardless of the level of discount, now’s your chance to scoop some of the label’s popular hoops and puffy silhouettes.

Jenny Bird Rings On Sale

Whether you prefer a more low-key style for everyday wear or are more drawn to eye-catching pieces that are sure to earn a wave of compliments, there’s a discounted Jenny Bird ring for you. 

Jenny Bird Bracelets On Sale

From bold cuffs and chunky bangles to delicate chain bracelets, you can find it all on sale. Plus, you can start a brand-new stack and get an extra 10% off when you buy two or more bracelets.

Jenny Bird Necklaces On Sale

During this two-day sale, take your pick from the brand’s best-selling zodiac and monogram pendant necklaces for a touch of personalization, opt for something more classic with chain and pearl-adorned styles, or make a fun style statement with pieces boasting shells, charms, glass beads.

Jenny Bird Anklets On Sale

Jenny Bird has long been in on the return of the anklet, and with warm weather fast approaching, could there be a better time to try one out for yourself?
